    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static ItemDetailDialogFragment newInstance(WifiP2pDevice device)
        Create a new instance

        This is dialog with show the contents of the passed in WifiP2pDevice contents using its toString() method.

        If there is a WifiP2pInfo object associated with this device, this will be displayed as well.

        Parameters:
        device - the WifiP2pDevice object for the device to show
        Returns:
        the dialog fragment
        See Also:
        AperiMainActivity.mDatabaseH
